title: Dodgers Spring Training tickets on sale Monday
body: Dodgers single-game Spring Training tickets go on sale at 9 a.m. PT Monday and can be purchased online at dodgers.com/spring or over the phone at 800-905-3315. Single-game tickets start at $9 and parking at Camelback Ranch-Glendale is free. Tickets will also be available at Camelback Ranch, the Spring Training home of the Dodgers, beginning at 10 a.m. MT on Feb. 2 at the ticket office. Ticket office hours are 10 a.m.-4 p.m. MT Monday through Saturday. The office will remain open for 30 minutes following the conclusion of play on game days. In addition to single-game tickets, season tickets, luxury suites, mini-plans and group packages are also available. Fans can visit CamelbackRanchBaseball.com or call 623-302-5000 for more information. Joey Nowak is a reporter for MLB.com. Follow him on Twitter at @joeynowak. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Joey Nowak
